name: Solution Union
tag_list: white-label-backup, private-label-backup, white-label-hosted-exchange, online-backup-reseller, private-label-hosted-exchange, hosted-exchange-reseller, backup, storage, online-backup, remote-backup, off-site-backup
overview:
Whether you call it Private Label, White Label, or SaaS (software as a service) this is the place where you change your business. In today’s marketplace technical contractors need a set of in-house solutions to remain competitive but also generate residual revenue to stay profitable. Slim it down, get it hosted, and achieve efficiency. Your customers will love you for it!

Solution Union has been pioneering private label solutions for over 6 years and through constant innovation has set the standard for the industry. As a technical services company, we understand what field support requires and what businesses actually need. If we don’t use it, we don’t sell it. It really is that simple. Our Private Label philosophy is also very simple; needs to be manageable, contract free, and 100% private. Your clients are just that, your clients and preserving that privacy is priority number one on all the applications we sell.

Solution Union is a better strategic partner because we offer more then one private label or white label product to our resellers. Our application base is growing all the time and we will continue to strive to bring value added applications to our clients.

We believe strongly in our approach and are committed even more so to your success. Join us today and change your business!
